data.claim: Color Harmony Schemes: 1) Monochromatic - single hue, vary tints/shades. 2) Analogous - 3 adjacent colors, harmonious/calming. 3) Complementary - opposites on wheel, high contrast/vibrant. 4) Split-complementary - base + 2 adjacent to complement. 5) Triadic - 3 equidistant colors, balanced/playful. 6) Tetradic - 4 colors forming 2 complementary pairs. Use 60-30-10 rule: primary 60%, secondary 30%, accent 10%.
